text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحًا وَءَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمْرَٰنَ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran over the worlds -
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Allah telah memilih Adam, Nuh, keluarga Ibrahim dan keluarga 'Imran melebihi segala umat (di masa mereka masing-masing),
